great_scientist.name: Great Scientist
great_scientist.ability: Can be expended to instantly complete current research or construct an Academy (+4 science)

great_artist.name: Great Artist
great_artist.ability: Can be expended to trigger a Golden Age or create a Great Work (+4 culture)

great_general.name: Great General
great_general.ability: Provides combat bonus to nearby units or can construct a Citadel

great_merchant.name: Great Merchant
great_merchant.ability: Can be expended for a large gold bonus or establish a trade mission

great_engineer.name: Great Engineer
great_engineer.ability: Can be expended to rush production in a city or construct a Manufactory (+4 production)
